keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Current and former members of the California National Guard have struggled to repay extra money they received unwittingly. Now Congress may help.

headline.print_headline: Soldiers Struggle to Repay Enlistment Bonuses That They Received in Error
headline.main: Soldiers Struggling to Repay Enlistment Bonuses Issued in Error

snippet: Current and former members of the California National Guard have struggled to repay extra money they received unwittingly. Now Congress may help....
abstract: Members of Congress are seeking to help National Guard troops in California struggling to repay  re-enlistment bonuses and other incentives doled out during Iraq and Afghanistan wars; order for repayment comes in wake of 2011 audit that found widespread mismanagement, overpayment and fraud by Guard in the state.
